titleStmt.title: A prayer, or, Petition for peace November 22, 1645.
titleStmt.author: Eleanor, Lady, d. 1652.

notesStmt.note: Caption title (p. 3): A prayer and petition for peace / by the Lady Eleanor.
2 blank leaves, with ms. bibliographic notes, bound in front of t.p.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
